user_stories.title: User Registration
user_stories.description: As a new user, I want to create an account with email and password so that I can start using the task management application
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password on registration form
System validates email format and password strength
User receives confirmation email after successful registration

user_stories.title: Task Creation
user_stories.description: As a logged-in user, I want to create new tasks with title and description so that I can track my work items
acceptance_criteria: User can access task creation form from dashboard
User can enter task title and description
Task is saved to database and appears in task list

user_stories.title: Task List View
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a organized list so that I can review and manage my workload
acceptance_criteria: User sees list of all their tasks on dashboard
Tasks display title, due date, and priority
User can mark tasks as complete/incomplete
